      • Method Detail

        • void initializeDao()

        • void initializeRegistry()

          Instantiate DAO objects

        • void loadConfigModels()

          When walking thr the files from the directory: - Skip everything but yaml file. - Sort these files in order to ensure that checksum remains same regardless the order in which files are read from the directory

        • Environment retrieveEnvironment(Deployment deployment)

          If configuration has changed since the flow creation, then retrieve and rebuild objects from DB

        • Promotion retrievePromotion(Deployment deployment, java.lang.String promotionIdent)

          If configuration is changed since the flow creation, then retrieve and rebuild objects from DB

        • Webhook retrieveWebhook(Deployment deployment)

          Validate base config directory

        • void triggerArtifactCreated(Artifact artifact)

          If configuration is changed since the flow creation, then retrieve and rebuild objects from DB

        • void triggerDeploymentCompleted(Deployment deployment)

          Work flow for deployment completed Updates the deployment status to note a forward progress

          Parameters:
          deployment

        • void triggerDeploymentCreated(Flow flow)

          Work flow for deployment created This is an internal trigger fired when deployment is verified (success/failed) OR when artifact is created

          Parameters:
          flow

        • void triggerDeploymentFailed(Deployment deployment)

          Work flow for deployment failed Mark the deployment and flow with failure

          Parameters:
          deployment

        • void triggerDeploymentStarted(Deployment deployment)

          Work flow for deployment started Updates the deployment status to note a forward progress

          Parameters:
          deployment

        • void triggerPromotionFailed(Deployment deployment, PromotionResult promotionResult)

          Work flow for promotion failed Update the deployment and flow with failed status

          Parameters:
          deployment

        • void triggerPromotionSuccess(Deployment deployment, PromotionResult promotionResult)

          Work flow for promotion success Add promotion results to deployment. Updates deployment/flow when last promotion has succeeded

          Parameters:
          deployment
